title: BRIEF-Blackstone Minerals Provides Assays From Co's Initial Drilling At Ta Khoa Nickel Project, Vietnam
text:
BRIEF-Blackstone Minerals Provides Assays From Co's Initial Drilling At Ta Khoa Nickel Project, Vietnam

Commodities 57 minutes ago (Sep 17, 2019 10:01)

BRIEF-Blackstone Minerals Provides Assays From Co's Initial Drilling At Ta Khoa Nickel Project, Vietnam Sept 17 (Reuters) - Blackstone (NYSE: ) Minerals Ltd : * ASSAYS FROM CO'S INITIAL DRILLING AT TA KHOA NICKEL PROJECT IN VIETNAM DELIVERED SIGNIFICANT PLATINUM, PALLADIUM AND GOLD ASSAYS

BRIEF-Blackstone Minerals Provides Assays From Co's Initial Drilling At Ta Khoa Nickel Project, Vietnam
